cast.name: 恩尼科·萨伽多伊 Eneko Sagardoy
阿尔巴·吉莱拉 Alba Guilera

introduction: After two years in prison by a affair with drugs, Jack Mayfield come backs to his tome together his brother Mike, his wife Alma and his little son Raymond. Looking for a second chance, Jack accepts a work offered by Mike, preacher of the town, as night watchman in the old abandoned mine of the town to prevent that the thieves steal industrial materials that still are there to shell them in the black market. Meanwhile Alma realizes about the secret desires of his brother-in-law to her, Jack struggles to leave behind his past of alcohol and drugs as well as his violent remembers of childhood due to the abuses of his father, at the same time that he starts to believe that somebody or something inhabits the old mine, a weird presence that wanders by the night watching him in the shadows waiting for attack...
